rules: Enforce TypeScript strict mode - no 'any' types without justification
All API calls must have error handling with try/catch
No hardcoded API keys, URLs, or credentials - use environment variables
All new functions must have JSDoc comments
React components must have PropTypes or TypeScript interfaces
No console.log in production code - use structured logging
Database queries must use parameterized inputs - no string interpolation
All async functions must handle rejection/errors
